body_content.explanation: a device used to operate or control a machine, a computer game, etc.:
examples: Moving my body made me feel more immersed in the game than if I had just been pressing buttons on a controller.
The kids answer questions by touching a hand-held controller.
The assisted braking controller is integrated into the dash.

body_content.explanation: a person who controls something, or someone who is responsible for what a particular organization does:
examples: That was the year he became Controller of Radio 4.
